title: Among Elms and Maples identification of setting

content.question: The setting described in the poem is best identified as a landscape that

choices.label: was photographed by Walker Evans from multiple angles on multiple occasions
is depicted in a photograph that has captured the speaker’s attention
the speaker has sought out after seeing it in a photograph
the speaker is revisiting after having spent many years away

content.answer: is depicted in a photograph that has captured the speaker’s attention

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
